duties_responsibilities.duty: Installation, maintenance, and troubleshooting of laptops, desktops, client-side software applications, and printers within a dynamic network infrastructure and MRP system.
Managing and maintaining computers, users, security, and access privileges through Active Directory.
Documenting software installations and hardware inventories on client-side devices.
Conducting technology needs analysis to address general IT requirements.
Collaborating with IT colleagues to address network infrastructure challenges and enhancements.
Translating technical concepts into easily understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders.
Providing on-site and remote support for warehouse facility, resolving desktop, printer, and handheld scanner issues.
Fulfilling additional duties as assigned by IT management.

education_certification.credential: IT Certifications are desirable but not mandatory
Proficiency in Windows Desktop OS and Active Directory
